subject: feat: add .env file support for GH_TOKEN authentication
body:
Enable API extraction to work in AI sessions and non-interactive
environments by supporting GH_TOKEN via .env file.

Changes:
- Add .env.example template with GH_TOKEN configuration
- Update extract-api.js to load .env and use GH_TOKEN
- Update setup-gh.sh with --save-env flag and .env support
- Add .env to .gitignore (secrets shouldn't be committed)

Authentication priority:
1. GH_TOKEN environment variable
2. .env file in project root
3. gh auth login (interactive)

This enables AI assistants to use API extraction by simply creating
a .env file with their GitHub token.
title: add .env file support for GH_TOKEN authentication
